CV2111_01 can be called without a valid session so that the user can change the password if its expired
In this case we try to lookup the user, change the password and create a new session

if password encryption is enabled we need to compare encryted passwords
otherwise we compare unencrypted passwords
if there's not yet a salt value the password origins from a time before salt values were introduced
This also means that its from a time where passwords were not case sensitive so we do convert to uppercase herer
add salt value to password(s)
hash passwords ...
now check if password change can be allowed ....
change password if its allowed ....
